item.description:
Would you like to learn a set of self-help tools that truly work, because they address what is actually happening in your body.  Get a healing, uplift your spirits and regain your hope? 

We are inviting you to an evening workshop of learning, healing and sharing.  Also I will try a new format where everyone will have an opportunity to receive a personal healing from me.

During this event we will briefly revisit the basics - you will discover how anxiety is caused by energy displacement, and how to realign your energy to resolve your discomforts.

We' start out by exploring Energy Gates, the major energy relay stations of the body and a vehicle through which the flow of our vital energy is directed that keeps the body aligned and balanced. Ancient energy medicine practitioners were aware of how our bodies regulated this flow of energy. These practitioners developed detailed maps of the various energy systems and how they affect our emotional and physical health. Learn the system of Energy Gates and powerful techniques that will:

1. Step-by-step, safely and playfully shift through four levels of embodiment into a full presence with yourself and other people in your life.

2. Decrease anxiety, eliminate persistent worries, and create states of profound healing

2. Significantly lower your stress levels and lower your levels of brain chemicals related to anxiety, and increase your production of vital (and very pleasurable) brain chemicals related to your well-being

3. Dramatically improve your ability to sleep better, focus, concentrate and think more clearly.

4. Stimulate the creation of new neural pathways between the right and left hemispheres of your brain, balancing your brain and leading you to a high-performance state, scientists call "whole brain functioning”

Unfortunately millions of people have no choice but to try to live in this debilitating state of discomfort that results from energetic misalignment. You do not want to be one of them. I am inviting you to embark on an exciting journey to the new anxiety and trauma-free you. Let us get started. Join us for a highly experiential presentation, live demonstration and personal practices.

Warm welcome to everyone! I am looking forward to meeting all of you!

Schedule 7:00 Social time.

Meetup and introduction 7:15  – 9:30 Personal practice, teaching, live demonstration and sharing
